title: As if he wasn't already OP enough

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Now he can smite you without even having the item that allows you to smite champions....

Why am I not surprised.

replies.body: I think there might have been a glitch and the game thought he smited you, I don't really know, maybe scripts?

> [{quoted}](name=LevvyLeviticus,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=jpaQQIqK,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-10T21:00:48.415+0000)
>
> I think there might have been a glitch and the game thought he smited you, I don't really know, maybe scripts?

Or maybe it's the old bug of buying a skirmishers and then undoing and getting trackers still leaving you with skirmisers skills.
